# Tiktok-Down
# Install: 
```
npm install tiktok-down
```

# Usages: 
```javascript
const tiktok = require("tiktok-down");
tiktok("https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSRaH4adj/")
  .then(data => {
    console.log(data)
})
```
> Or
```javascript
const tiktok = require("tiktok-down");
const data = await tiktok("https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSRaH4adj/");
console.log(data);
```
